external_games.name: Kyokujitsu ni Kokoro Arawasu Gojitsudan: So long

name: Kyokujitsu ni Kokoro Arawasu Gojitsudan: So long
summary:
A fandisc after story to the indie game "Kyokujitsu ni Kokoro Arawasu".
Several years after the Russo-Japanese War, several years after the happy ending of the main characters.
Set in the Taisho era, before the Washington Conference.
